price: (32) [Allāh] said, "O Iblees, what is [the matter] with you that you are not with those who prostrate?"
arabic: قَالَ يَٰٓإِبۡلِيسُ مَا لَكَ أَلَّا تَكُونَ مَعَ ٱلسَّٰجِدِينَ

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: qāla yāib'līsu mā laka allā takūna maʿa al-sājidīna
